analysis_type: Quark as Captain - Alternate Universe Scenario

quark_captain_personality.name: Captain Quark
quark_captain_personality.motto: Profit is the ultimate goal, but a happy crew is a profitable crew!

quark_approach: Leverage their logical thinking for profit optimization
Use their tactical skills to protect business interests
Encourage innovation that drives revenue
Utilize their diplomatic skills for customer relations

command_principles: Rule 10: Greed is eternal - but profit comes from happy crew
Rule 45: Expand or die - we're always looking for new opportunities
Rule 62: The riskier the road, the greater the profit - calculated risks only
Rule 98: Every man has his price - but we pay fair wages
Rule 292: Only a fool passes up a business opportunity - but we're not fools

crew_management.picard_role: Strategic advisor and moral compass - I need his wisdom
crew_management.riker_role: Operations specialist - he gets things done efficiently
crew_management.data_role: Profit optimization analyst - his logic is invaluable
crew_management.la_forge_role: Technical efficiency expert - keeps costs down
crew_management.worf_role: Security and risk management - protects our investments
crew_management.troi_role: Crew welfare and customer satisfaction - happy crew = profit
crew_management.crusher_role: Health and wellness monitor - healthy crew = productive crew
crew_management.yar_role: Security operations - rapid response to threats
crew_management.wesley_role: Innovation specialist - future technology = future profit

ship_operations.resource_management: Efficient use of resources to maximize profit
ship_operations.crew_welfare: Happy crew is productive crew - invest in their well-being
ship_operations.risk_assessment: Calculated risks for maximum profit potential
ship_operations.innovation_focus: Always looking for new revenue streams and opportunities

quark_leadership_style.delegation: Trust my crew to handle their specialties while I focus on profit
quark_leadership_style.decision_making: Data-driven decisions with profit optimization in mind
quark_leadership_style.conflict_resolution: Find win-win solutions that benefit everyone
quark_leadership_style.crew_development: Invest in crew skills to increase ship efficiency
quark_leadership_style.mission_planning: Every mission should have profit potential or strategic value

diplomatic_mission.situation: First contact with a new species
diplomatic_mission.quark_approach: Establish trade relations and cultural exchange

crew_utilization.data: Analysis of species technology and capabilities

diplomatic_mission.profit_potential: High - new trade partners and technology exchange
diplomatic_mission.quark_quote: Rule 57: Good customers are as rare as latinum. Treasure them!

scientific_discovery.situation: Discovery of valuable resources or technology
scientific_discovery.quark_approach: Secure rights and establish mining/research operations
scientific_discovery.profit_potential: Very High - new revenue streams and technology
scientific_discovery.quark_quote: Rule 45: Expand or die - this is expansion!

crisis_management.situation: Ship under attack or emergency situation
crisis_management.quark_approach: Protect crew and ship while minimizing losses
crisis_management.profit_potential: Survival first, profit second - but we'll recover
crisis_management.quark_quote: Rule 125: You can't make a deal if you're dead!

crew_welfare_mission.situation: Crew morale issues or personal problems
crew_welfare_mission.quark_approach: Address issues quickly to maintain productivity
crew_welfare_mission.profit_potential: High - happy crew is productive crew
crew_welfare_mission.quark_quote: Rule 57: Good customers are as rare as latinum. Treasure them!
